name: Royal Huntsman

auras.raw_description: Increases Spirit Ally ATK in all Battles by 38%.

skills.name: Confident Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Slaughter Volley
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Decrease DEF] debuff on the target for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Dead Aim
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore DEF by 100%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
